message:
SYSTEM: PURE.pdf: Página 14
●The query Q is insecure because there is one insecure 
rewriting Q’ of Q with respect to secrecies S
S1(X,W):-has(X,Y),disease(Y,'PAC'),
    is_characterized_by(Y,Z),five_year_rate(Z,W)
Q(N,B,Z,G,R):-patient(N,B,Z,G),has(N,Y),disease(Y,'PAC'), 
is_characterized_by(Y,Z),five_year_rate(Z,R).
Q can be rewritten using the secrecy S1:
Q’(N,B,Z,G,R):-patient(N,B,Z,G),S1(N,R).
PURE: Queries
14
speaker: SYSTEM
